Package ru.myx.ae3.transfer.encoding.stream

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    B_InputStream
    This class provides an InputStream for reading "b" encoded data in mail headers.
    B_OutputStream
    This class provides an OutputStream that encodes it's content to the "B" encoding for email headers.
    Base64InputStream
    This class provides an InputStream for base 64 encoded input.
    Base64OutputStream
    This class provides an OutputStream that encodes it's content to the Base 64 encoding.
    Bit7OutputStream
    This class confines an output stream to only send the seven first bits in every byte.
    Q_InputStream
    This class provides an InputStream for reading "Q" encoded data in mail headers.
    Q_OutputStream
    This class provides an OutputStream that encodes it's content to the "Q" encoding for email headers.
    QuotedPrintableInputStream
    This class provides an InputStream for Quoted Printable encoded streams.
    QuotedPrintableOutputStream
    This class provides an OutputStream that encodes it's content to the Quoted Printable encoding.
    SmtpInputStream
    This input stream performs two general email specific conversions.
    SmtpOutputStream
    This OutputStream controls the formation of the output stream according to the rules of the SMTP protocol described in RFC 821.
